oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Finance Subcommittee Reports, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reports detailed the budgetary and financial matters of a consolidated Clarksville-Montgomery County, called for the Proposed Charter to establish the Department of Finance, and suggested the appointment of a Budget Committee. An annotated copy of the final report is included here.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Finance--Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
